hero.title: GauSakhi
hero.subtitle: Empowering Gau-sewa
hero.description: Field app for farmer onboarding, RFID scanning, and contribution tracking — built for rural India.

about.title: You Do the Work. GauSakhi Does the Rest.

voice.title: Just speak in Hindi
voice.description: Say "Aaj 800 kg gobar liya" → App saves it automatically.

scan.title: Scan cow tags
scan.description: Point your phone at the Gau Aadhaar tag—no writing needed.

weight.title: Weight comes by itself
weight.description: Smart scale sends slurry weight straight to your phone.

truck.title: See your truck on map
truck.description: Know where your slurry truck is at any time.

reminders.title: Get voice reminders
reminders.description: Phone tells you: "Kal 4 baje Shri Krishna Gaushala jana hai."

offline.title: Works without internet
offline.description: Save data offline. It uploads when you get signal.

step1.title: Open the app in the morning
step1.description: See your tasks for the day.

step2.title: While working
step2.description: Scan, speak, or let the scale send weight.

step3.title: Finish your day
step3.description: Everything is saved and sent—no extra work!

acceptance.title: Made for Real Field Conditions
acceptance.subtitle: Designed specifically for Gau-sewa workers in rural India.
acceptance.poorNetwork: Works in villages with poor network

preview.title: Experience GauSakhi in Action
preview.subtitle: Optimized for rural connectivity and designed for Indic users with intuitive interfaces.
